<<<<<<< HEAD
A just vindication of learning, or, An humble address to the high court of Parliament in behalf of the liberty of the press by Philopatris. Blount, Charles, 1654-1693. Milton, John, 1608-1674. Areopagitica.
[6], 18 p.
[s.n.], London : 1679.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Attributed to Charles Blount. cf. NUC pre-1956. Follows Milton's "Areopagitica" closely in parts.
=======

Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Attributed to Charles Blount. cf. NUC pre-1956. Follows Milton's "Areopagitica" closely in parts.
